data.description_html: As summon undead I, except that you can summon one undead from the 5th-level list, 1d3 undead of the same type from the 4th-level list, or 1d4+1 undead of the same type from a lower-level list.
data.effect: One or more summoned creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
data.name: Summon Undead V
